h2_title: Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide
content: The key to keeping track of this creature is to see where the cloud moves and jump out of the way when it gets close to you. Misty Cloud favors the use of a flaming bundle, operating it like a hammer and delivering fire attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cloudy_Mist,_Misty_Cloud.md', within the main section titled 'Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud', specifically from the subsection 'Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The key to keeping track of this creature is to see where the cloud moves and jump out of the way when it gets close to you. Misty Cloud favors the use of a flaming bundle, operating it like a hammer and delivering fire attacks.
